website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy material and inexpensive price make this an ideal choice for pet owners who want to protect their vehicle interiors on a budget.
pros: Comes in the option of bench or hammock style
Easy to spot clean with a damp towel
cons: Lacks slits for car seat buckles
May not provide a precise fit for some head rest designs and very spacious back seats

customer_reviews.title: Works well for F150
customer_reviews.text: Fits okay in our 2016 F-150. Reaches the end of either side. The slot that needs to fit two buckles in is a little stretched and off center as you can see in the picture. Also it covers the middle seat belt since it's attached to the seat. I may have to cut the cover and Velcro it underneath the seatbelt if we ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: robin liljenquist

customer_reviews.title: 2014 Ram 1500 Express Crew Cab (Bench Seat)
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 2014 ram 1500 crew cab w/ folding 1 piece bench seat. The material is very strong and definitely will hold up to any pooch or items you’ll throw on it. Hair clings to it and doesn’t escape the fabric. The anchors will rip if you adjust the cover after those are in place (FYI). Truly this cover can be reversed if you had a really muddy or dirty situation you wanted contained. The straps and connections leave plenty of room to fit just about any truck style bench seat. Cut outs for seat belts are a plus too! See pictures for further reference.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the other model I ordered prior, this one unbeknownst to me at the time of ordering does NOT hang from the front and rear seat head rests, it only hangs form the rear seat headrests and is useless because it in no way protects the rear seat from the dog...the seat bottom portion has no way to stay put so little doggie simply by moving around basically instantly slides the cover aside and now is resting, sitting, and scratching the rear seats. Zero utility in this stupid design.
customer_reviews.author: The Croatian Sensation

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keeping the car clean
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in our 2016 Toyota Rav 4. There are little bar type things that stick in between the seat to keep the cover in place. The buckles go around the headrest and there are straps to pull underneath the seat. Stays in place pretty well. Because the material is waterproof, my dog doesn't really like the feeling when she stands on it, so we just lay some towels back there to make it more comfortable on long road trips. It's really easy to put on and to take off if you are going to have human passengers back there.
customer_reviews.author: Sharkbait790

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit on 2013 328i
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I opened this. It looked much nicer in real life than the pictures on here convey! I ordered this along with 3 other seat protectors to figure out what would work in my car. This was the thinnest by far - very much a no-frills protector. I did not achieve a good enough fit in my 2013 BMW 328i. My main goal is to protect my car seats from 2 toddlers climbing in and out, and kicking the seat, and I didn't feel like it covered enough on both sides to protect the seat as the kids are climbing in/out. Returning because of the poor fit.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2nd use, trash.
customer_reviews.text: The piece of junk ripped on BOTH tabs that slide into the seat. Nothing was pulling on them, it was just terrible stitching and very cheap materials. I wasn't expecting a lot from this cover other than to work for about a year or so. Well mine lasted two outings. Waste of money, thanks Amazon Basics. I'd like a full refund if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Edgethe40

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: This goes in the back of my sedan pretty quickly. I'm most interested in keeping the paw/claws off my leather and minimizing dog hair dispersion. I wish I had a wagon, but this is the next best thing. The velcro bits on the side, where the seat back and bottom meet, don't make a lot of sense to me. I'm not sure how they are to be used and/or helpful. The straps on seat bottom at the front corners don't go around a lot of modern car seats as they're mounted tightly to the floor... otherwise, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: ricomania

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: It is super easy to install and compatible with both SUV and Sedans. We used it in Ford Fusion, Subaru Crosstrek, F150 as we were dog watching for our friend. We had two Dobermans, regardless of how much they scratch and play on top of it, it never teared. So it is very durable. It is also repels water very well. I accidentally dropped a gallon of water, spilled almost a half of it. There was not water on the seat at all. So I would highly recommend this, definitely worth of money.
customer_reviews.author: Anka

customer_reviews.title: It fits and work great on my 2017 Ford Escape
customer_reviews.text: It fits and work great on my 2017 Ford Escape. The product pictures shows the back being covered and going all the way to the headrest. Reality is, it goes 3/4 of the way up to the headrest. For me it works out alright, my dog is only 28 lbs.. For a larger dog the seats backrest would be exposed. There is a crinkly sound to the material when my dog moves around and he does not like the noise. I lay a blanket over the seat cushion and that muffles the sound and he likes that.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Man

customer_reviews.title: One Size Does Not Fit All
customer_reviews.text: I have a Prius V. Even though the size of this cover covers my back seat, the Velcro fasteners do not meet and the openings for seat belts are not conveniently located for my car. It is easy to clean and/or vacuum up the dogs hair. Overall it serves the purpose intended but does not fit my seat very well. I wish I could say what vehicle this cover fits but, your guess is as good as mine. I would suggest using the car manufacturer's accessory if available or go to your local Auto Parts store to purchase one that you are sure will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Separg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in a pinch when we decided to take my car to the beach with 2 dogs (65 & 50 pounds) for Thanksgiving. IT arrived quickly & exceeded my expectations for the price. It's a bit short than I'd like (doesn't go all the way to the floor of the car protecting the carpet from hair), but is very sturdy and kept the majority of the sand out of my seats. Even with brushing & rinsing off the dogs (and their leashes) were sandy when we left Sunday morning, but the seat of my car only needed minor vacuuming when we got home. I'll be ordering another for our other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ready when you are, regardless of the task.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is ready whenever I need it. I'm able to leave it on all of the time and allows no interference to loading large boxes. When it's time to load passengers, my grandchildren and daughter, I know that my seat is protected as well as my family because of the holes that accommodate the seat belts. A design, well thought out!
customer_reviews.author: dah12345

customer_reviews.title: Great besides 1 issue!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover for the price. Fits our 2014 F-150 seats perfectly. We are using this for under our children’s car seats and I love the fact that the material is thick and water proof. I did a lot of research before ordering one and went with this one due to price. My only issue (which I was aware when I ordered it) is that the middle seatbelt is inaccessible. I plan on on cutting the cover and velcro it to access the middle seat belt. For the money it’s definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mapp

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this seat cover for my new 2016 Nissan Rogue although the measurements given indicated it would be too large. I thought well, it's inexpensive and if it's way too large I can cut it. Turns out, I installed it today (very easy) it is just the right size for my vehicle. The measurements shown online include the side flaps and lower flaps. Fits perfect. Easy install. Couldn't ask for better. Very durable material. Glad I bought it. And it is very inexpensive. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Observer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this seat cover for over a year and have been very happy with it. It has protected the seats beneath it well. I'm starting to see some small rips (I keep my dog's nails reasonably short), but they have not impacted the functionality yet so I expect I'll get plenty more use out of it.You'll never be able to clean all of the dog hair off of it, but my dog sheds so much that I don't really care about making it spotless for 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: This seat cover came in clutch after a day of trail running with two pups - no dirt or hair on my seats! I will say that the cover was slightly large for my back seat, but I drive a compact car, so this was to be expected. I am relieved to finally have a way to keep my seats clean and free of dog hair! Assembly in car is exceptionally easy -- just loop the buckles around your headrests, push the weights between the seat cushions, and loop elastics around the edge of the seats. And just like that, you've got lasting protection against moisture, muddy paws, and stray pet hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Protecting the leather back seat from backpacks, kayak gear, occasional carpooling sweaty dusty hikers. Nothing fancy but Good for the price. Easy on and off. The corner elastic straps don't work with my back seats, but the headrest straps work well enough. Folds into a tiny space for keeping in the car between uses. Better than the towel I was tossing in there and protects the back of the seat, not just the bottom part. Nice gaps so you can still use seat belts. Fits my 2014 Forester just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up, backing came off after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Do not get this. It has little rubber like circles on the backing and they started to come off making a mess of our seat and causes us to throw out the cover. Not well made. Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: R. Roddewig

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very durable. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Its a little awkward around the sides of the seats but this is a life saver. We use this underneath my kids car seats to protect the car from....goldfish, cherrios, applesauce, milk....pretty much anything they spill. It is very waterproof and very durable. Only thing is I wish there was a way to use this and still have access to the middle seatbelt. The shoulder strap doesn't have a hole, but in all fairness, this would kind of defeat the purpose of the cover. I would buy this again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Good, generic car seat cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, generic bench car seat cover. Its a thick, utility material with a vinyl waterproof backing. There are slits cut where you'd expect most seatbelts to be. We wanted to use this specifically underneath our kids' carseat. Unfortunately, it doesn't have slits where youd have to install a latch system. We still used them, just had to modify them slightly. I placed them in the car, marked where new slits needed to made with chalk and then took them inside to cut them. I made a hem around the slits to prevent future fraying, but I dont really think it was necessary. It was simple enough to cut to fit both several different vehicle types.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this item!
customer_reviews.text: This fits great in my RAM 2500. Keeps the dog hair, drool, wet/dirty feel prints, etc. from dirtying up my truck. FIts great, easy to put on and worth the cost. I like this better than the sling, so my dogs can jump in and out of the truck on their own. Has seatbelt slats/holes if you buckle your pups in or someone wants to jump in the back seat with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed!
customer_reviews.text: This is designed so well! I was super impressed. I used to use a blanket on the backseat for my dog, but it was always moving around and it just looked sloppy. This fits perfectly on the seat and it is tight and secure. Very easy to clean as well. My only concern was, after purchasing I realized that my backseat didn't have headrests...so if you are considering this product, please check to see if you have headrests and if you don't, some cars (like mine) have anchors for carseats. I used the anchors to latch the hooks around. If you don't have either, I am not sure that this product will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Dietrichs

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase to save your seats.
customer_reviews.text: We have a 64 lb Golden Retriever and a 10 lb Pomeranian who like to go hiking and camping with us. This little cover has saved our seats from getting wet and muddy. We also use this to haul fire wood and other dirty things without damaging the seat. The straps that wrap around the head rest are adjustable and clip together for easy removal. We gave a Nissan Versa Note and it fits the back seat perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer023

customer_reviews.title: Stinks to high heaven, don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would work perfectly. It almost did, it clipped around the headrests in my truck back seat and the elastic bands looped around the seatbeds. Then my dog was a little damp after a mountain bike ride one day. Now there is a horrid smell stuck to the item like that seinfeld episode where jerry's car smell infects everything it comes into contact with. We washed it and had no effect, the item still reeks. I have a golden retriever and his raincoat did the same thing, must be that stench clings to whatever material this is.
customer_reviews.author: O Red

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cover if you are just looking for waterproof but it is loud if you dog moves and not soft at all. I put a sheet over it so at least he can lay on something soft. The other negative is that in the middle of it (I guess the seatbelt holes) dirt goes right through there and on to the seats. That is my only negative with it. As I mentioned if you are looking for just waterproof then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: A parent must have
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2003 vibe with a bit of overhand on either side due to the small nature of my vehicle. I bought it for my two messy kids to stop ruining the seat. It matches my black interior and has adjustable straps to make it look more presentable on the seat. The seatbelt holes seem to be in the right places, a bit off, but not by much. I haven't yet tested a lot of waterproofness but I hope that it will pass that test as well. I would recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Taylorann

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy cover, easy to install, and my dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my TJ. The front "flap" isn't attached to anything, but it tucked well on the sides, and the back-seat insert wedges (fit beween the back and bottom of the seat) hold it down fine. Since I don't have headrests, I use bungie cords to draw it tight down to anchors on the pan of the Jeep (could likely also attach them to the bottom of the seat too). It's a nice cover, and has held up well for the dog.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewA

customer_reviews.title: Really Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to protect my Honda CR-V seats and it really does the job. It will fit a larger vehicle as well. The material is cloth on one side and waterproof on the other. The seat cover is very easy to install and stays in place. Recently, we had a real-life test of the cover's ability to protect. I rinsed it in the washer (gentle cycle) and hung to dry. It came out like a dream and the car seat was fully protected. I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBun

customer_reviews.title: dog and kid coverage
customer_reviews.text: best choice I made!! amazing product, t ruky is water proof. son spilt drink and a puddle just sat there until I could clean it up. dog pooped in the car once and it was so easy to wipe off and machine was and dry it did amazing. easy to out on ad looks nice. love this . thanks
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, hard to remove smells though
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits great and protects your seats well. I would have rated it 5 stars until my dog peed on it and now no matter how much I've washed it and sprayed it with a chemical made for neutralizing urine, the smell still remains. I will still order another one because it has worked great, I just can't figure out why I can't get the smell out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise a great value!
customer_reviews.text: This seems to stay in place fairly well. I think my dog thought it was a bit slick to stand firm on but not so much he can't stand up. My car, a Honda CRV has 3 seats that fold down in the back. Once this is attached properly, the straps make it hard to put the seats up or down individually, ok with two people. A small rip came about from trying to pull up one side. Otherwise a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Bebe S

customer_reviews.title: Seat saver!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2011 Subaru Forester and 60lb Collie/Golden Retriever pup. Saved my car seat from drool and vomit on our last 8 hour car ride before the dog's motion sickness meds kicked in! Washed it/dried it, and it's ready for our next (hopefully less adventurous) road trip! Bonus: Also does a pretty good job of keeping shedding dog hairs off the fabric, but some will make it through the gaps for seat belt anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Susannah

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy dirty dog protection
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put this thing through hell yet but it couldn't be any easier to put on. There are clips (like a bookbag) for securing it around the headrests. This makes it easy to take one side off when I need to fold down the seat but I recommend wrapping the excess around itself or it may come loose.
customer_reviews.author: Kurosh Makki

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Mediocre Product
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay, I had one for a year before it disintegrated. I bought it again while mulling a more permanent and probably expensive one and found that for some reason the second one doesn’t fit! I can’t get the bottom to tighten at all so it rides up and my puppy takes that as a cue to burrow under it... the first one was better although it should have lasted longer. Not super impressed with quality/longevity but it’s a great price!
customer_reviews.author: A. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a car with 3 seats across.
customer_reviews.text: There are weird elastics under the sides that I suppose would grip onto a seat that is a bucket - elevated off the ground but in our backseat all it does is cause the fabric to bunch and not lie in place. We have a Tesla Model 3. If your backseat does not have any room UNDER the side seats where the elastic can grab then this is not the right cover for you either. (Also does not work if your middle seat has a shoulder strap)
customer_reviews.author: Semi

customer_reviews.title: Simple design, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: The cover is easily installed. I've used it in my Prius and my Mazda CX-5. No problem with either installation. My dog doesn't have a bladder problem so I don't know how well it will keep moisture from my rear seats. I use it mostly to keep hair off the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Delgado

customer_reviews.title: I think it should have specified the yr & model it would fit....oh well not end of the 🌎
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed...This I wanted 2 protect my Mitsubishi Galant back seat& it did not fit ... I had 2 send back 😭
customer_reviews.author: Eliza W

customer_reviews.title: I liked this cover but would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I liked this cover but would not purchase again. My dog would jump into the car and move around on our trip which would cause the seat cover to ride up so the cover was not covering the outside edges of the bench seat. Besides this, it is effective in keeping liquids and dirt/fur off of the seat. I later purchased the hammock version of this seat cover and like that much better.
customer_reviews.author: dearjoyce

customer_reviews.title: She didn't love it at first
customer_reviews.text: Fits backseat of my 2016 Malibu. Winnie goes to daycare a lot, so she's in my car quite a bit. She didn't love it at first, but got used to it and it saves my seats.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I finally have a clean car!
customer_reviews.text: My old seat cover fit my Honda Element pretty poorly and it wouldn’t stay in place so I tried this one as a replacement and I absolutely love it! It fits perfectly. The things you shove between the cushions stay in place and there’s just enough fabric to tuck down on the sides. I hike with my dogs 3-5 days a week so my car can get pretty filthy but this cover is so easy to remove that i just shake it out once or twice a week. When I have human passengers I can just fold it up and stick it under the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah

customer_reviews.title: People with car seats please read my review....
customer_reviews.text: Fit ok for my 2013 Honda Accord. But there is only one opening for buckles/car seats. I had to use a razor and cut another opening for my car seat anchors. Its also a little short. It could be 4-5 inches longer and that would protect the front of the seats better from my kids. but for less than 20 bucks it will work.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase for Use with Toddler Carseats
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for use under my twins' carseats because they are at an age where any food/snacks they have go all over the place. I was impressed by the thickness of the cover and it nicely fit my Kia Forte's back seat. I was able to anchor the seats via the slots in the cover (in the middle and on the edge). I was considering buying a $30+ seat cover but glad I went with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tore on first outing
customer_reviews.text: This was a little ignorant to install the bottom section too wide for my 1994 Cavalier and the top section short thus causing the cover not to fit smoothly. The first outing my dog caught his paw in the seat belt slit and proceeded to tear the cover from seat belt slit to front of the bottom piece I am going to try to return.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Preece

customer_reviews.title: Better than a "basic" seat cover!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it was a basic car seat cover. It was much better than expected. Material is good quality and there are several unexpected features. It has two tabs on the back with cylinders in them that fit in the crack in the seat and also had two elastic straps on the back of the bottom to hold it down. This prevents the cover from shifting around. It also has buckels on the top straps that go around the seat head rest instead of clasps, much sturdier. Only thing I wish it had was Velcro over the slots for the seatbelt but that isn't enough to drop my review.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.Happy with the purchase and customer support.
customer_reviews.text: My interior is Black with red stitching and this back seat cover is a great way to get a great product for a great price. I looked for front and back seat covers for a couple of days and am happy I found this seat cover. The seller is also easy to contact and will answer any of your questions. Very Happy with the purchase and customer support.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great in Hyundai elantra
customer_reviews.text: I got this mainly for my dog, but I'm going to keep it on at all times because I made the mistake of buying a car with tan seats. And they stain like crazy. Overall, it's great for the price. Fits my Hyundai elantra well. The only issue is that the bottom corners get folded up and they don't stay well with the elastic under the corner of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cover fit perfectly for Toyota Highlander 2017 .
customer_reviews.text: I tried few different kinds before I buy this one , cheaper , fit better , cover more area , it's thick enough , well made , the straps hang over the neck rest easy to adjust , two more elastic on both side to secure the cover on your seat . It came in the box , folded nicely , I received it after 4 days I put in order , not like the others I bought came a month later from China ... I wish I found this cover first so I don't have to waste money on other covers I bought before .
customer_reviews.author: Female

customer_reviews.title: No more sliding blankets off the seats
customer_reviews.text: Purched this for my big dog that LOVES going for rides. Prior to purchasing this seat cover I would use big blankets so she wouldn't harm my leather seats & the sheets/blankets would slide all over the place (mostly to the floor). This has been a good buy at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Sidesaddle

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a short time
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a few years. Ordered the cover 2 years ago and it just broke. The actual cover is still nicely intact, but the straps that go around the headrests started flaking apart. It wasn't used very often either. Very weird, but could be due to living in a very dry, hot area. Got good use out of it but is not a long-term use product.
customer_reviews.author: Ruda

customer_reviews.title: If you own a dog, buy this NOW!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I've made in a long time! My old dog is incontinent and on our weekly 3 hour car trips shes been having a lot of accidents. This week, she went #2 and it cleaned right off and kept my car perfectly clean! We sprayed it with clorox spray and wiped it with paper towels and voila! I have a ford escape and it fits perfectly across the back seat. The holes for the seat belt were a little nerve racking but could be easily covered with a towel. They aren't very soft so I figured adding a blanket or something for comfort was a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: born4shop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my new leased vehicle
customer_reviews.text: When I leased a new vehicle, it came in the wrong color. A light gray instead of black therefore I purchased this product to protect from my 3 kids. It's heavy duty but looks natural in the back seat. Nothing goes through it, and it cover my very wide back seat. It's also easy to install and doesn't slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for small price
customer_reviews.text: Covers back seat of SUV. Keeps dog hair and mud off. Will curl up (creep up?) on edges (near doors) - so some paw prints and hair. Took our (large) dog home form vet after surgery and he was incontinent of bladder and bowel - seats kept clean and dry and we just removed and hosed off the cover. WARNING: there are seatbelt holes, so not entirely water or stain proof
customer_reviews.author: Tim E

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I use it for uber humans are disgusting savage idiots. It’s tearing but has been ok after a year.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Simply a liner
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a pain for one person to install; much easier with two people. As a liner, it does the minimum job. Hair from our short, wiry hair dog still managed to get through to the seats. It keeps the seat protected from tears and moisture, but that's about all.
customer_reviews.author: ERK

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cover to protect your backseats
customer_reviews.text: I put this cover in the back seat of my car because I take my dog to the dog park daily and her muddy paws were doing quite a number on the backseat of my car. This is a great cover to protect your backseats, and I really like that there are slits for seatbelts. The only thing that brought this down to 4 stars is that it doesn't fit as well as I thought it would, the cover doesn't exactly reach all the way up to the headrest in my car. For reference I have a Mitsubishi Highlander Sport. However, the rest of it is great, and it is indeed waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Not bad considering the cost.
customer_reviews.text: The material is better than I expected considering it was the lowest priced seat cover I looked at. I fit well onto my Tacoma double-cab back seat. I took off 1 star because of the seat belt slots. I bought this because my dog has a tendency to pee when riding in a car. The seat belt slots are at the lowest spot because of the angle of the bottom cushion. If my dog pees, the water proof material will channel the liquid to the seat belt slot then get onto my truck's fabric. I've been putting a towel down to prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: Whoever designed this actually knows what it takes to keep seats covered. The anchors worked great on my 08 sentra, keeping the cover close to the crease of the seats. Loops over the backrests work well, and the velcro at the edges are a nice touch. There's even holes for your seat belts! The cover itself is a somewhat shiny vinyl that seems nice enough. My dog didn't mind jumping up and sitting on it. Sure saves the seats in comparison to using a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Tezza

customer_reviews.title: Simple, durable and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a dog. Rather, I bought this cover to use on my rear seat to haul cargo: everything from potted plants to groceries to car parts. It has held up well. It installed within 5 minutes and has not suffered any tears or stains yet (after several months). It has saved my backseat, and blends perfectly with my black interior.
customer_reviews.author: half13

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting cover
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far keeping the back seat in our Ford edge looking brand new. I actually kind of wish there was not cutouts for the seatbelts. Spills would easily make it down to the seat and if I have passengers back there I fold it up and put it in the cargo area.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you own kids and transport them in your car.
customer_reviews.text: Ian so glad I got these for my Nissan Rogue. I wish I would have gotten it the day I bought the car. I already have kid spills but at least I have saved the seats from spills since I put this in! I did have to modify the seat belt opening a bit with scissors to get the car seat anchors to fit. Also, kind of a pain when I need to drop a section of the split back seat, but I get it. I also bought one for my wife's 2017 Sonata. Already paid for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great product that balances quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this seat cover after a lot of comparison shopping online as well as in the stores. It is a worthy investment and I have been very pleased with its quality and its price. I have used it to protect the back seat of my Toyota Prius for the enjoyment of a guide dog during both long and short road trips. I have also placed a dog crate in the back seat on the cover when my two little pups have been crated during travels. Great product that has been easy to wipe or dust off as needed and lives to tell the tail/tale!
customer_reviews.author: Scribbles

customer_reviews.title: Durable and better than some name brands
customer_reviews.text: Works very well in my 2013 4DR Focus. The fabric is of decent thickness and I don't see it tearing/fraying anytime soon (been in use ~8 months). The straps seem durable and are sown well to the fabric and the buckles are sufficient. I was trying to decide between this AmazonBasics one and another name brand that was a couple bucks more. I saved the couple bucks and went with this one. Glad I did. I stumbled onto the other brand name cover at a local Pet store. The fabric material didn't feel nearly as durable. So all in all, Amazon hit it out of the park with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Hey Hey Trojan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install - Good Material - Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and made of sturdy material. Our dog regularly rides in the back seat of the car while we take him to run errands or to the park each week. Once this was on, he jumped in the backseat and was nice and comfortable. Now we don't have to worry about getting the back seat dirty with drool/dirt/mud he tracks in when he jumps into the backseat after a fun day outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hernandez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not slip resistant! But overall good.
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits well in a Honda Civic and a Nissan Frontier, my boyfriend and I each bought one for our vehicles. The only thing I don't like about it is that my boston terrier is scared because he slides all over the back as it is not very slide resistant and liquids could deep through the seatbelt holes.. I think I will try putting down a blanket to prevent my pup from sliding around back there.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is awesome. It is made so well and was so easy to put on. I am beyond pleased with it. I now have a fold down scooter that will go in the trunk so the groceries will have to go in the back seat. This is the perfect cover. I am so impressed with the quality and price. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lee

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit for 2017 Toyota Highlander
customer_reviews.text: + great price + Decent enough material - doesn't have enough slits to allow access to metal hooks in car seat (middle is good but sides are covered) - forcing the issue scrunched up the material and ruins the potentially clean look - seat edges are also partially exposed because of this
customer_reviews.author: Frank H.

customer_reviews.title: hair confined to seat cover
customer_reviews.text: Did a good job of protecting the back seat of my new car from my Golden Retriever shedding hair. I was pleased that the hair didn't get twisted into the carpet or seat fibers making it difficult to get out.
customer_reviews.author: BFG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, works with carseats
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install. Sterdy material. Able to use with carseats (only reason I bought it, I have no dog, but messy kids) *note* if installing with rear facing car seat, you will need to make a small hole for the anchor, which wasn't a big deal to me. If your using your seatbelts instead of the anchor, it will work with no alteration.
customer_reviews.author: Cat and Jason

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: this cover is simple to put across the back seat and saves my car from the saltwater and sand that my dog brings in from our almost daily trips to the beach for our walks. As an added benefit, it also catches his mounds of hair. I just take it out and shake it out in the parking lot of my condo building. For his comfort, I still put the comforter down for him. Only, now I put it on top of this seat cover. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Towers

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my kids and their car seats to protect my leather seats in my car. So far, the baby has dropped her bottle nipple first causing formula to leak out on this cover and clean up was simply a breeze. I like that the straps at the top are adjustable and the elastic straps on the bottom hold to the seat bottom securely even with children climbing in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and is perfect for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and is perfect for dogs. I got this cover for a long road trip and realized that you can't use the middle seatbelt with the cover in place. It also has nothing holding it to the seat so it got bunched up a few times. It definitely paid for itself because we had a few accidents in the car but it could be better.
customer_reviews.author: TINA N TRAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Got a dog?  Get one of these
customer_reviews.text: Fits well In the back seat of my truck. My dog is about 100lbs and i was concerned he would pull down the top side but it actually stays up really well
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Does an amazing job of keeping muddy dog feet off of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it had a set of middle buttons. My significant other attempted to put the seat down and tore this seat cover. I wish the cover buttoned away to allow just the half car seat lean down. Does an amazing job of keeping muddy dog feet off of the seats though!
customer_reviews.author: Shop049

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice durable cover that is easy to clean. Only knock is that it doesn't stay in place with a lot of movement. It can pull and move around if there's a lot of movement on it or pulling it around. Otherwise just a great item.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miesse

customer_reviews.title: Good for protecting seats (didn’t use for pet)
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use it for pet so I don’t have problem with pets causing it to slide all over the place. I used it to protect the car seats when I have to put boxes on top of the seats since my back car seat does not fold down. It’s small and light. Easy to keep in the trunk and pull out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: perfect for protecting the back seat in our new truck
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2, so we can keep one on the seat, while washing the other. I put it in the washing machine, tumble it in the dryer for a few minutes to remove dog hair, then lay it over the shower curtain rod to dry the rest of the way
customer_reviews.author: Cinda C. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Really surprised-
customer_reviews.text: So happy! This was perfect to take our dog on a two day road trip for vacation. Able to buckle her in, wasn't sure with description. Simple to attach. It arrived just in time, and protected the seats perfectly. Her fav blanket and toy, and we were off without worry, even with the rain and snow heading south. Great service, great material, price point super for product. Stands up to fur and paws! Highly recommend. Best, Laurie
customer_reviews.author: Louiegthor

customer_reviews.title: Good for humans too
customer_reviews.text: Didnt intend to use for pets but more for uber/Lyft passengers during summer heat with accidentall spills. Water resistance is great and seats look presentable
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy.CL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seat cover, not just for pets!!
customer_reviews.text: This fits the back seat of my Rav 4 perfectly! We have a booster seat and there are holes for seatbelt latches. It took about 10 minutes to install and was super easy!! There have been several spills, stepping on the seat with dirty shoes, etc and this has been a seatsaver!
customer_reviews.author: Aundrea M.

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, good sizing, no split-seat function
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product that I use for my messy children. Using in a 2010 subaru impreza sedan. I wish the cover could accommodate a 60/40 bench seat as I did manage to rip the back while putting my seats down a while back. Other than that extremely minor niggles, I wouldn't pay more for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Harmed by laundry pods

customer_reviews.title: must have for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: This is the best way to keep your back seat interior clean while taking the dog(s) for a ride in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Neal M. Naydo

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, works like it’s supposed to. I’m using it to protect my seats from my kids though and it slides down behind my sons back when he sits in the seat. They can still buckle and all that.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: - is definitely waterproof with a visible lining - has an adjustment (velcro) that allows it to fit better near the doors
customer_reviews.text: Decent product for the price. I have a dog cover from a different manufacturer as well. Compared to that one, this one: - is definitely waterproof with a visible lining - has an adjustment (velcro) that allows it to fit better near the doors. - is less padded. There is no padding. - does not have velcro around the seat belt buckle holes so dog can access buckles easily - has seatbelt buckles that may not fit all cars. The cutouts are closer towards the center and not very long.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, but a bit rough material
customer_reviews.text: The material is rougher than what I expected and I have a dog and kids sit on it. Kids comain about the material being uncormofatable. I guess it does what it's supposed to and protects well from diet and hair, so 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Phaedrus

customer_reviews.title: Got kids?
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the dirty little munchkin from ruining the back seat of my new car. No more do I have to worry about crayons, ice cream, and whatever else tiny, inconsiderate humans can do to the cloth interior of my 2019 Jetta. Peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: D green

customer_reviews.title: Good backseat coverage for Chevy Malibu
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover for my backseat to be protected from the spills and feet of my grandson in my Chevy Malibu. It is not the most attractive cover but it doesn’t matter, as long as the seat is protected.
customer_reviews.author: Capger

customer_reviews.title: They mean very basic cover.
customer_reviews.text: Very. Very basic. Speed a few dollars more if you can afford to. There are much better options for just a little more. EG instructions say to spot clean not wash. If you have very clean dogs maybe that will work. But if they're that clean do you even need this?
customer_reviews.author: tek-nique

customer_reviews.title: we feel that our car is better protected against the elements (our children)
customer_reviews.text: We use this under the kids car seats. We were tired of cleaning up goldfish and milk stains etc from the seats of our car. We purchased this as well as the seat protector for the back of the front seats... we feel that our car is better protected against the elements (our children).
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I haul my big, heavy golf bag in the back seat of my Honda Ridgeline. This seat cover provides an excellent protection barrier to keep the seat fabric nice and clean. Very well made. Easy to put on. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using to protect back seat from kids spills - works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Thick material, goes on easily, and saved the backseat from stains almost the second I put it on. I actually got this to protect the seats from my kids (food, gum, silly putty, markers, etc.) and couldn't be happier with the purchase. There are slits for the seat belt buckles so no problem using it with the booster seats.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, but difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: Fits and protects the seat as advertised. The description is clear that it is not machine washable, and states spot clean only. Regrettably fur does not spot clean from this cover, I am not sure how one spot cleans shed fur from this thing, but I am unfamiliar with an easy way. Ended up ordering another item that is machine washable. Works as advertised, but difficult clean.
customer_reviews.author: J. Plett

customer_reviews.title: Basically useless.
customer_reviews.text: Won't stay in place. Slippery material dog slides around on it. Seat belt holes are big and alow dirt and water to go on seat bellow making seat cover basically useless.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L

customer_reviews.title: Oversize
customer_reviews.text: I drive an Audi A3, and the cover keeps sliding off the back seat. It's too big, although it's advertised as fitting all types of cars.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph P

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the fabric seems to be pretty good. But since I don't have headrests in the back seat it gets hooked into the baby car seat hooks. It does not fit as high as the picture shows, at least not for my car. I really don't like the slits in the middle for seat belts - too much dog hair, dirt, dander, etc. will get on the seat. All in all, it will work better than the old sheet I was using. If it didn't have the seat belt slits and if it fit the back of the seat higher, I would have given this five stars. It's still pretty good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up well over 1 year of light use
customer_reviews.text: The car seat covers the seat still, but it has been a little over a year and I am ready to order a new seat cover. My 70 lb. dog is in the car about 2x a month. The fabric near the straps around the headrests ripped almost immediately after I started using it and now one of the two seat anchors has fallen off.
customer_reviews.author: iheartred

customer_reviews.title: Great to have in the car with the dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great to have in the car with the dogs. I have taken them swimming and put them in the car after, everything brushed right off. Great product for the money! I've had it for over a year now and it's still in perfect shape!
customer_reviews.author: Charlee01

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job of keeping mud and grass off rear seat
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this so far. I have been using this quite a bit lately for taking the dogs to a local park and green-belt. At times, they are a mess with mud and grass after the walk, and this seat cover does a great job of keeping that mess off the rear seat of my Highlander.
customer_reviews.author: KnowsTech

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t fit my seat well so I need to adjust it often. I sowed the seatbelt holes toget because they were very large and the sand and dirty that the dogs tracked in was getting on the seat. This bast part and only reason I didn’t return it was because water doesn’t get through it.
customer_reviews.author: R McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works for what they are used for, just wish it was a bit wider so I could push it down over the sides of the backseat. (In all fairness I have never had one that was wide enough to do this) I have multiple dogs and when they jump in the back one always catches the cover with a paw. I have another blanket underneath the cover too, so the seat is fine. Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Has6Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have an Accord and it fits perfectly!!! I only wish it came down and Velcroed on the mats so the floorboard was covered too for long trips. But it does protect the seats and secures in a way that It cannot come loose. Great Design. A lighter color would be a great option so it doesn't get so warm. Plus it would go better with light/beige interiors.
customer_reviews.author: nancyntenn

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Waterproof Car Back Bench Seat Cover Protector for Pets - 56 x 47, Black
feature_bullets: Bench seat cover to keep your car tidy while transporting your pets
Protects the back seat from scratches, dirt, dander, and spills
Secures over seat using two headrest loops, two seat anchors, and two elastic straps

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
